subject: Re: FW: Website next steps
preview: Hi Craig,  Thanks for sending the screenshot.  We have updated the header and footer :)

full_threads.body:
Hi Craig,

Thanks for sending the screenshot.

We have updated the header and footer :)

Hi Joel,

Thanks. It's sort of fixed. Please see comments in screenshots below.



Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

We have updated the mobile menu. Let me know if this works for you?
https://seasprout.com.au/

Hi Joel,

The mobile version of the website (which most people use) isn't functioning the same way as the desktop version.

e.g. the menu at the top is missing, and critically the buttons at the bottom to book a table or order delivery/pick-up aren't working so customers can't access these.

Please can you take a look and fix urgently.

Thanks,

Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Craig,

We have updated the pages and forms and removed newsletter form from footer.
https://seasprout.com.au/loyalty-program/

Hi Joel,

Please can you change the sign-up button link on the website Loyalty Program page to the following address.

https://seasproutfreshwater.marsello.app/

And remove any sign-up boxes or forms on the website.

Can you also change the copy on this page to the following:-

Join the SeaSprout Loyalty Program & Get Rewarded!

At SeaSprout, we believe in rewarding our incredible customers for their support. Whether you're stopping by for your morning coffee, enjoying a relaxed meal with friends, or ordering your favourites online, our loyalty program lets you earn points every time you visit.

The more you dine, sip, and enjoy, the more you earn-redeem your points for free drinks, exclusive discounts, and special perks across both our café and restaurant.

Signing up is quick, free, and packed with delicious benefits. Join today and start enjoying the rewards of being part of the SeaSprout community!

Thanks,



Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Perfect! Thanks Joel.

I'll follow up with some other comments over the weekend.

Thanks,



Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

We have updated the text and we cleared the site and server cache.
Can you try now?

Hi Joel,

This one isn't quite right. You need to add a space before and after the "-"

Show 6 am-no bookings as 6am - no bookings

Thanks,



Craig Walker
Owner

Cafe | Restaurant | Catering

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

Sure, all good on this one.
https://seasprout.com.au/bookatable/

Hi Joel,

Please can you make the following minor tweaks to the Book a Table page.

Show 5 pm as 5pm
Show 6 am-no bookings as 6am - no bookings



Thanks,

Craig Walker
Owner

Cafe | Restaurant | Catering

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

Sure, we have updated the page.
https://seasprout.com.au/bookatable/

Hi Joel,

That's great, thanks. Can the boarder around the widget be removed? Or is that part of the widget?

Can you also add the following text under "Book A Table"

Our Restaurant serves dinner Wednesday to Sunday from 5 pm. Use the options below to book a table.
Our Café opens daily from 6 am-no bookings required.

Thanks,



Craig Walker
Owner

Cafe | Restaurant | Catering

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

Sure, we have adjusted the form layout of the page.
https://seasprout.com.au/bookatable/

Hi Joel,

Yes, this works now, however it is displaying the booking widget as a single column. On the version we have configured it is 2 columns wide, the calendar on the left and the questions on the right. Can this be changed to be 2 columns wide on our site too?

Thanks,

Craig Walker
Owner

Cafe | Restaurant | Catering

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

We are looking into this. Let me know if this works for you?

https://seasprout.com.au/bookatable/

Hi Joel, Heath,

We have some issues that need fixing up.

Firstly, the booking widget is not displaying when you click on Book a Table. I don't believe this is an issue with the embed code because the link itself works fine.

The navigation menu across the top is not how we originally discussed or had it previously.

I'll get some more detailed comments back to you soon, but in the meantime can you take a look at these 2 items asap?

Thanks,

Craig Walker
Owner

Cafe | Restaurant | Catering

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au

Hi Craig,

I hope you had a great weekend.

We have made updates to the site.

  1. Book a Table page. Done*
  2. Newsletter popup disabled for now. Done*
  3. Marshello, onhold
  4. News single page. Done*
  5. - Loyalty Page. Done*
    - About page. Done*
    - Gift Cards. Done*
    - Menu Items. Done*
  6. This looks good. We will also need a page for each section, where we can go into more detail about each offering. These pages can then be linked to each section in the main menu. Done*
    the pages below are in private so you need to logged in to view it and also if you can send a copy for these pages as well.
    - https://seasprout.com.au/restaurant/
    - https://seasprout.com.au/cafe/
    -https://seasprout.com.au/catering/

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the update. Please see the following comments.


  1. Thanks

    1. Can you use the following embed code to create the book a table button landing page and button <iframe data-id="nbi-widget" src=https://bookings.nowbookit.com/?accountid=424f4a85-fcc3-4129-ba83-9a0d2aec562c&venueid=12919&theme=light&colors=hex,529987&bg=transparent&banner=hidden></iframe>



<script src=https://plugins.nowbookit.com/iframe-resizer-build/bundle.js></script>



From this I will need a booking link, such as www.seasprout.com.au/bookatable which shows the above imbedded page on our website. I'll use this to add a facebook and Instagram button and a google button to book a table directly from those platforms.


  1. Thanks. However, this has become a bit annoying while on the site. Let's remove this for now. I'm thinking we add a Loyalty sign-up button somewhere near the top but let's wait until the menu is back in place as it might look too crowded.

  2. Nothing for now. I need another meeting with Marsello before we can integrate this into our website. This is simply for loyalty program/newsletter sign-up. I assume the sign-up newsletter will be linked to the Marsello account in some way but I need to find out how.

  3. Looks good. Only comment is I think the main title of the news article is a bit lost over the picture. It doesn't feel connected to the main article. Can we put the article heading inside the article section and reduce the image height by half, same as the loyalty page image height? Can we also add the date the article was posted?


  4. Loyalty Page - Can you move the title to be in line with the picture? Also, rather than one single paragraph, I think the text needs to be split into separate sentences, so they are easier to read, possibly with some bold & bigger headline text in between sentences.
    The sign-up button isn't configured yet. This will need to create a sign up pop-up so customers can fill out their details.


    About Us - Same comments as above. I will also get you some new copy to add to this section.

    Gift Cards - Same comments as above.

    Please add the full navigation menu back into the website.

  5. This looks good. We will also need a page for each section, where we can go into more detail about each offering. These pages can then be linked to each section in the main menu.
Thanks,



Craig Walker
Owner

0423 784 301 | craig@seasprout.com.au

www.seasprout.com.au
